caseTitle: Federal Public Service Commission, Islamabad & another v. Dr. Shahid Hanif
tagline: Discussion on Rule 3 & 12 of the APT Rules 1973, Section 7 of the Federal Public Service Commission Ordinance 1977; Sl.No.12 Estacode Edition 2007 as well as Sl.5.2, Estacode, Edition 2015. According to SRO No.1138(I)/2014, the experience gained in a regular fulltime paid job after obtaining the required qualification is reckoned for the post in question.
